data.title: List of Major League Baseball spring training cities
data.text:
The following is a list of current and former Major League Baseball spring training cities.

Some Toronto Blue Jays regular-season home games for 2021 were played in TD Ballpark in Dunedin, Florida.

City Current team(s) Current ballpark(s) Capacity Former team(s) Bradenton Pittsburgh Pirates (1969–present) LECOM Park[1] 6,602 St. Louis Cardinals (1923–24)

Philadelphia Phillies (1925–27)

Kansas City/Oakland Athletics (1963–68) Clearwater Philadelphia Phillies (1947–present) BayCare Ballpark[2] 8,500 Brooklyn Dodgers (1923–32, 1936–41)
